title: Louis Vuitton Epi Papillon Trunk
description: Louis Vuitton Papillon Trunk in black Epi leather. Featuring gold-toned hardware, detachable chain handle, and detachable & adjustable leather shoulder strap. The push-lock closure opens to a spacious light pink microfibre interior. Approximate dimensions: 20cm(L) x 9cm(H) x 9cm(D), handle 17cm, strap drop 52cm. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned)
